channel.title: PLz help me?
channel.description:
Heyy mopar, me again with another problem LOL. Yeah so i've been trying for like 2mnths to make a webclient. I just tried again and I done it. I jar and signed, made auto-cache downloader, all that. But one small problem, when i upload this html code to my website it comes up with error click for details...
<HTML> <HEAD> <TITLE>Your Webclient</TITLE> <META HTTP-EQUIV="PRAGMA" CONTENT="NO-CACHE"> </HEAD>
<BODY>
<applet name="bladeblitz" width="765" height="503" archive="client.jar" code="client.class"> <param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m"> </applet>
</BODY> </HTML>
But when I run it from my computer with the client.jar it works. I think what it is is that it needs the client.jar and the html code on the site to run. That right? Well I tried that and nothing. Please help me!!!!
Thanks :)
DW I DONE IT
